operators.title: Change
info: Operates on T-Mobile and AT&T networks in the United States of America.
Coverage in Alaska is not guaranteed.
operators.other_info: Coverage in Alaska is not guaranteed. The hotspot feature is restricted on AT&T network.

packages.title: 1 GB - 7 Days
packages.short_info: This eSIM doesn't come with a phone number.
packages.qr_installation:
eSIM name: Change

Coverage: United States

To activate the eSIM by scanning the QR code on your eSIM capable device you need to print or display this QR code on other device:

  1. Settings > Cellular/Mobile > Add Cellular/Mobile Plan.
  2. Scan QR code.
  3. Confirm eSIM plan details.
  4. Label the eSIM.

To access Data:

  1. Enable data roaming.

To top up:

Visit airalo.com/my-esims or if purchased through the Airalo website/app visit “My eSIMs” tab.
packages.manual_installation:
eSIM name: Change

Coverage: United States

To manually activate the eSIM on your eSIM capable device:

  1. Settings > Cellular/Mobile > Add Cellular/Mobile Plan.
  2. Manually enter the SM-DP+ Address and activation code.
  3. Confirm eSIM plan details.
  4. Label the eSIM.

To access Data:

  1. Enable data roaming.

To top up:

Visit airalo.com/my-esims or if purchased through the Airalo website/app visit “My eSIMs” tab.

operators.title: Bonbon Mobile
info: Operates on the Orange network in France.

packages.title: 1 GB - 7 Days
packages.short_info: This eSIM doesn't come with a phone number.
packages.qr_installation:
eSIM name: Bonbon Mobile

Coverage: France

To activate the eSIM by scanning the QR code on your eSIM capable device you need to print or display this QR code on other device:

  1. Settings > Cellular/Mobile > Add Cellular/Mobile Plan.
  2. Scan QR code.
  3. Confirm eSIM plan details.
  4. Label the eSIM.

To access Data:

  1. Locate the APN settings in your settings menu.
  2. Update the APN to "rh".
  3. Enable data roaming.

To top up:

Visit airalo.com/my-esims or if purchased through the Airalo website/app visit “My eSIMs” tab.

This eSIM does not cover Northern Cyprus.
operators.other_info: This eSIM does not cover Northern Cyprus.

packages.title: 1 GB - 7 Days
packages.short_info: This eSIM doesn't come with a phone number.
packages.qr_installation:
eSIM name: Merhaba

Coverage: Turkey

To activate the eSIM by scanning the QR code on your eSIM capable device you need to print or display this QR code on another device:

  1. Settings > Cellular/Mobile > Add Cellular/Mobile Plan.
  2. Scan QR code.
  3. Confirm eSIM plan details.
  4. Label the eSIM.

To access Data:

  1. Locate the APN settings in your settings menu.
  2. Update the APN to "airalo2"(iOS)/Create a new APN as "airalo2" (Android)
  3. Enable data roaming.

To top-up:

Visit airalo.com/my-esims or if purchased through the Airalo website/app visit “My eSIMs” tab.

  1. Settings > Cellular/Mobile > Add Cellular/Mobile Plan.
  2. Scan QR code.
  3. Confirm eSIM plan details.
  4. Label the eSIM.

To access Data:

  1. Locate the APN settings in your settings menu.
  2. Update the APN to "airalo2"(iOS)/Create a new APN as "airalo2" (Android)
  3. Enable data roaming.

To top-up:

Visit airalo.com/my-esims or if purchased through the Airalo website/app visit “My eSIMs” tab.

Coverage: United Arab Emirates

To manually activate the eSIM on your eSIM capable device:

  1. Settings > Cellular/Mobile > Add Cellular/Mobile Plan.
  2. Manually enter the SM-DP+ Address and activation code.
  3. Confirm eSIM plan details.
  4. Label the eSIM.

To access Data:

  1. Enable data roaming.

To top-up:

Visit airalo.com/my-esims or if purchased through the Airalo website/app visit “My eSIMs” tab.

packages.qr_installation:

Coverage: Antigua & Barbuda

To activate the eSIM by scanning the QR code on your eSIM capable device you need to print or display this QR code on other device:
